metadata.title: USN-4176-1 -- GNU cpio vulnerability
metadata.description: Thomas Habets discovered that GNU cpio incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to privilege escalation.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4176-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  cpio - 2.12+dfsg-6ubuntu0.18.04.1 cpio-win32 - 2.12+dfsg-6ubuntu0.18.04.1 No subscription required
